---
title: "Contact Me"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```



Please fill out the form below with your information. We will get back to you as soon as possible!



<form>
  <fieldset>
<div class="form-group">
  <label for="exampleInputEmail1" class="col-form-label col-form-label-lg mt-4">Email Address</label>
  <input type="email" class="form-control form-control-lg" id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="example@email.com">
  <small id="emailHelp" class="form-text text-muted">We'll never share your email with anyone else.</small>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label class="col-form-label col-form-label-lg mt-4" for="inputLarge">Phone Number</label>
  <input class="form-control form-control-lg" type="text" placeholder="123-123-1234" id="inputLarge">
</div>
<div class="form-check form-switch">
  <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="flexSwitchCheckDefault">
  <label class="form-check-label" for="flexSwitchCheckDefault">`I consent` to receiving text message notifications</label>
</div>
<div class="form-check form-switch">
  <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="flexSwitchCheckDefault">
  <label class="form-check-label" for="flexSwitchCheckDefault">`I do not consent` to receiving text message notifications</label>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label for="exampleTextarea" class="col-form-label col-form-label-lg mt-4">what would you like to say...</label>
  <textarea class="form-control form-control-lg" placeholder="please include... 
    - the best way to contact you
    - if you are a student or if you are a parent writing on behalf of a student
    - what are you interested in (how can I help you?)
    - questions (if any)" id="exampleTextarea" rows="7"></textarea>
</div>
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
  </fieldset>
</form>
